parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of your Amazon Pinpoint application.

parameters.name: VerifyOTPMessageRequestParameters
parameters.description: Verify OTP message request. The destination identity to send OTP to. The OTP the end user provided for verification. The reference identifier provided when the OTP was previously sent.

nested_params.name: DestinationIdentity
nested_params.description: The destination identity to send OTP to.

nested_params.name: Otp
nested_params.description: The OTP the end user provided for verification.

nested_params.name: ReferenceId
nested_params.description: The reference identifier provided when the OTP was previously sent.

nested_items.name: Valid
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the OTP is valid or not.
